name: CALIBER
alternateName: Context Abstraction Layer Integrating Behavioral Extensible Runtime
description: A Postgres-native memory framework for AI agents. Provides persistent, structured memory that survives across sessions, enabling agents to remember context, avoid hallucinations, and coordinate with other agents.

offers.name: Self-Hosted
offers.description: Free forever. Run on your own infrastructure under AGPL-3.0 license.

offers.name: CALIBER Cloud - Storage Monthly
offers.description: Managed cloud storage for CALIBER memory

offers.name: CALIBER Cloud - Hot Cache
offers.description: High-performance hot cache for frequently accessed memory

featureList: Hierarchical memory: Trajectory → Scope → Artifact → Note
Direct Postgres storage via pgrx (no SQL parsing overhead)
VAL (Vector Abstraction Layer) for provider-agnostic embeddings
Multi-agent coordination with locks, messages, and delegation
PCP (Persistent Context Protocol) for validation and checkpoints
Custom DSL that compiles to configuration
Full audit trail of assembly decisions
